instructions:
Debone, skin and pound cutlets between waxed paper and sprinkle with salt. Melt margarine in a frying
pan and brown both sides at medium/high. Reduce heat to low, sprinkle with lemon juice and herbs and cook
a total of about 6 or 7 minutes. Remove chicken to warm oven. Combine G Washington, wine and water
with mushroom liquid and deglaze frying pan. Reduce liquid by about a third and add the mushrooms for the
last two minutes. Pour over chicken. Serve over toast points. 
*(Rev. 6/13/94)*
ingredients: 1 can (4 oz) mushrooms drain and reserve liquid
Water, with mushroom liquid to make 1/2 cup
name: Chicken Scaloppine
